data.why:
After trying to contact the author of Tie::SortHash to no avail, I
    have decided to contribute Tie::SortedHash. Tie::SortHash has
    numerous defects to include using pseudohashes. I spent a great deal
    of time trying to come up with a way to correct the problems, but
    always ran into backward compatability issues. For this reason I
    want to upload Tie::SortedHash, a better module.
